reviews.review:
Just finished the game, and I have to say this is easily one of my favorites!
When I played the first Portal I wasn't overly impressed to be honest, as it was rather short and not particularly difficult. Portal 2 on the other hand is just so much better.
For starters it's a lot longer than the first installment, has a co-op option, and more difficult puzzles.  
There were moments I really had to think for a few minutes and take another good look around on how to proceed and get the puzzles solved, which I really appreciate in a good puzzle game.
Besides that, the game has a really good story with a couple of nice twists and turns.
I mean who would've thought I would actually walk around with an AI potato? Genius! :D
Also, the ending!
Who knew turrets had other talents besides shooting holes in you?
Seeing that alone made the time and effort all worth it!
And of course the humorous comments you get to hear when you're playing.
It just lightens the often ominous atmosphere of your surroundings just when you start to wonder if you are ever going to get out this alive.

In short, if you haven't played this game yet, DO SO NOW!
It's worth every penny!
The only thing I have to complain about is that I'm still waiting for my cake!

Este juego de Valve es increible, su historia me encanto pero se hacia aburrida a ratos. Creo que su fuerte, realmente, es el Coop pero solo si tienes amigos y hablas por skype. Tiene infinidad de mapas de la comunidad y muchas opciones.

Una obra maestra, destruye tu cabeza pensando como pasar las camaras, mientras disfrutas de la asombrosa historia, que por su falta de datos te mantendra con dudas, y te obligara a sacar tus propias conclusiones...
The game which you can call - must have!

Sin duda alguna, una obra maestra. Mejora la mayor parte de los aspectos del anterior titulo, añadiendo nuevas mecanicas a los "puzzles" de cada camara, asi como los escenarios donde se desarrollan estas. Si le sumamos el modo cooperativo y las camaras de la comunidad, horas de juego infinitas.
атличная гама, пакупайте)))0))0). ана сдилает вас умней (тот кта умный - гавно хуюмный)))0). я гамаю в портил 2 с битманом, и тралирую иту лалку. типерь гладас и чел дилают мни сасай каждый день))0).
excellent

First Portal was awesome, but this one is even better. You get more background information about Aperture, more variable puzzles and awesome storyline. In my opinion, this game has also one of the best endings I've ever saw. Totally recommend for everybody!!!

Portal 2 est un excellent jeu de réflexion. Il parvient à allier scénario intriguant, ambiance fascinante et réflexion. Et si vous parvenez à bout de tous les casse-têtes de son mode solo et de son mode coop excellent, les nouvelles salles de la Workshop, créées par la communauté, vous offriront de nombreuses heures de jeux supplémentaires.
No coś niesamowitego! Każdypowinien chociaż zobaczyć co ta gra oferuje, jestem pewien, że każdy sceptyk zmieni zdanie do tej gry.

Minden tekintetben felülmúlta elődjét pedig az is fantasztikusra sikeredett. A - szerintem - legnagyobb hibákat sikerült is kiküszöbölniük: jobb történetet és hosszabb játékidőt kapunk a pénzünkért. Még ötletesebb és szerteágazóbb tesztkamrák várják a játékosokat.
És ha nem lenne elég, más játékosok által készített tesztkamrákat is betölthetünk, így a játékidő gyakorlatilag a végtelenig nyúlik.
Értékelés: 10/10

Right after playing Portal 1, I was much worried that I couldn't find Portal 2 being better, if not as good.
Now I am worried about Portal 3 if that would ever exist.

I thoroughly recommend this game.  Sure the game is a little short, but it has humour and a wonderfully subtle story with even the grafitti-textures on the walls being in-jokes, so you can play the game repeatedly without losing any of the initial charm.

Add to this the co-op mode and challenges, and you are sorted for some decent hours of gaming, and with people making third party maps there is constantly new maps and puzzles for you to try your hand at.
Highly recommend - there's sarcastic humor abound at the beginning, and it's a great interactive puzzle game that also has a coop mode!
Portals, Jumping, and glados making fun of you the whole time. What's not to love?

its a cool puzzle game with cool robots
a valve classic!

Portal 2 is a great game to new steam users. With it's stuning storyline, backstory to apature labs, and funny characters! Portal 2 is a must-have game for all gamers.


Rating: 10/10!
A very entertaining and fun game, especially when you play with friends or strangers in co-op mode.

My girlfriend really only likes puzzle solving games while I like FPS's and MMO's.  This game brought both of our likes together AND we could solve the maps together.  Tons of fun, if only it lasted longer!

Honestly this review needs no writing. Portal 2 is a fantastic game by all standards in both singleplayer and multiplayer. (TLDR at bottom)

Pros:
The level of depth in each level design and detail is to cry for
Single player is so immersive and one does not tire of puzzles, for the game goes on a gradual incline with its challenges. Beating one makes you feel genuinely accomplished
The in-game commentary is catchy, witty, and something worth following closely for storyline and entertainment sake
Secrets! (Rat Man's dens) and more
The multiplayer is incredibly fun. I played the multiplayer no less than 3 times with different friends. 
I especially enjoy the ruined feel of the area
The plot twists and the different areas you get to enjoy (the sights are impressively atmospheric)

Cons:
NONE.

TLDR: Just buy it. That is if you haven't already bought it, played it, and played it again.

All'inizio lo avevo lanciato per vedere come girasse sotto Linux, ma in pochi minuti si e' trasformato in una vera droga. Peccato che dopo un po' che ci gioco mi vengono i giramenti di testa, e devo fare molte pause. Apparte questo lo consiglio vivamente a tutti, è spassosissimo e un buon esercizio per la mente :)

Single player.  Co-op.  Custom Maps.  Design your own map.  This game has everything and tops the original Portal (which is already amazing) in every way.  If you are a fan of puzzles, you would be truly missing out on an amazing game if you haven't played Portal 2.

Después de la primera entrega de la saga , llegó este gran juego.Sin duda , se nota que es de la firma de Valve.
Un gran rompecabezas que te mantendrá enganchado hasta el último momento.En esta segunda entrega de la saga , la historia se profundiza más y se desarrolla mejor.Jugabilidad de 10.Recomiendo jugar al Portal 1 antes.

Como te enseñan al principio del juego observa el arte, observa portal 2, una historia magnifica para un juego sin Cg's y de puzles mas largo y en mi opion mas divertido que el uno si podeis haceros con los dos grandisimos juegos con una gran Ost, que por cierto es gratis con el juego.

A more than suitable sequel, with enough story and well-acted voice-over work to keep the game engaging even as it carries on much longer than the first one.

New elements added to the gameplay integrate well and keep the puzzles interesting.

For being handicapped somewhat by not having as much novelty as the first, Portal 2 stands well on all of its other elements as a game to make it a highly recommended purchase for any fans of the original.

9/10

This is one of the best games that I have ever played and probably one of the best that will ever be made. All of Valve's work before accumulated to this and it is a thoroughly enjoyable experience from the first minute to the last.
Exceptional story and great replayability. Definitely well worth the price, especially on a steam sale. I recommend the purchase!

合作解谜
十分考验逻辑顺序、观察力、想像力，和好（基）友互动合作的不二选择。

游戏自带简体中文，但联机时要注意双方昵称都不要带中文，否则可能连不上。
我很期待下一部作品，如果联机人数能达到4人或以上就更棒了！

Jo Portal 1 oli fantastinen peli, mutta kakkonen on jopa vielä mahtavampi. Tässä on kaikki ykkösosan hyvät puolet ja paljon lisää. Peli on huomattavasti ykkösosaa pidempi, ja pulmat ovat monipuolisempia. On suositeltavaa, että pelaa ensin ykkösosan, niin tarinasta saa enemmän irti. Portal 2 on todella nautittava peli, joka haastaa aivoja, tarjoaa jännitystä ja läpi pelattuaan jättää ihanan fiiliksen. Tässä on oikea pelimaailman taideteos.
A perfect experience all the way through.
